risk.model

Class RiskGameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • risk.model.RiskGameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskGameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class consists the business logic of the entire game.It consists of all the phases of the game. It calculates and assigns the armies to the players as per the territories occupied and the continents occupied.It also has the logic for loading and parsing the map from the map file.
    Author:
    Team8
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
